BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Marchi, S.6155-A, and Assembly Member Abbate, et al, A.9722-A, "AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to benefits for employees of governmental entities performing peace officer services in the city of New York, who are injured in the performance of their duties".
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Benefits for employees of governmental entities performing peace officer services (S.6155-A, A.9722-A)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  - "AN ACT relating to providing accidental and special accidental death benefits and health insurance coverage to the registered domestic partners of deceased members of the uniformed force of the New York city fire department who died in the line of duty on August twenty-eighth, two thousand one". S.6780/A.11012
AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
